title: The Jesus Horse
description: This book has been described as "The Black Beauty for Grown-ups." The span of 15 years is bridged in this timely awakening and awareness of where our own, unique and individual quests might ultimately take us. You'll love it or you'll hate it, and it will just maybe tear your heart out. At the same time, It might very well change the way you see the world. Through the cadence of each connection and the rhythm of the stories told, this book is a place you'll be glad you stumbled upon. Temptation, betrayal, hope, faith, success, triumph, and redemption--it's all here. It is the noise of the heart.
author: Melinda West Seifert
